title: I bought every single Gacha Pod.... (Collab with @PewDiePie )

comments.comment: instead of throwing the ones you don't like you could sneakily hide them in friends's houses when you visit
I love that Pewd's main goal is for the gacha gods to grant him something adorable that he could give to Marzia
havnt posted in a while, oops
This is video is just showcasing Felix descend into insanity, just to be brought back by bread. 10/10 would watch Felix open more gacha again

Pewds in UK talking about stoicism and minimalism.
Pewds in Japan: "I will spend ALL my money on gatcha"
I really enjoy the fact that Felix is in this phase like when people retire and they go back to work part time at a place just because they wanna do something, it’s more relaxed and casual

really sweet that he gives out the first 5/5 for something that marzia would have liked 12:49
Felix and Pewdiepie is the collab we needed
Was just entertained for 40 minutes straight by a grown man opening kinder eggs without the chocolate. I regret nothing.
This video is just pewds slowly descending into madness as he hears the train stopping alarm over and over again.

I've learned 2 things from this video so far.

1) I like watching pewds open gacha capsules and reviewing them.

2)id make a tiny diorama of a Japanese town or city/house with these mini appliances lol
It’s so nice to see big creators working smaller ones
It’s so nice of PewDiePie helping small creators like Felix
I like how he kept giving them all 1/5 and 0/5 until he found one that Marzia would like and so that makes it a 5/5
Part 2 when? I've been replaying this like once a week. There's something so entertaining about just Pewds opening and hating or loving gacha.
I like how Pewds is losing sanity near the end, the true gacha experience
I like how Pewds is having an existential crisis and enjoying at the same time

Pewds looks so happy showing off the cute ones to Marzia

The goat couple of all time. Period.
I love how felix as soon as marzia got back he was like a child showing his mom his favorite toys
35:55 Noooooo….. I wanted to play with Marzia. I spent so much time building it. Soooo wholesome. Pewds hitting every marriage goals.
"Girls get cute hamsters, boys get propane tanks." - Pewdz quote of the year - 2022
I love this new phase, looking at him do what he likes to do without any pressure or anything makes me really happy

28:58 This is a glue container for kindergarteners and elementary school students.  This product has been produced by a company called Fueki Nori Industry since 1975, and is called the animal series.  This glue is made from corn starch and is safe for children.
Felix is starting to realize we don’t always just want certain vids but also just seeing him do anything
12:40 I love how the first 5/5 one he rated is because Marzia will love it 🥹 Pewds being so sweet is everything
Felix rethinking his choices at the end is the funniest thing I have seen in a while.

11:02 This is Haniwa. Wiki→The Haniwa are clay figures that were made for ritual use and buried with the dead as funerary objects during the Kofun period (3rd to 6th centuries AD.) of the history of Japan.
(Europe at the same time.  Eastern Roman Empire, Odoacer, Ostrogothic Kingdom, Regnum Visigothorum, Frank ).
This haniwa has both hands raised, so it seems to be a product called Banzai Haniwa.
Felix + pewdiepie = greatest collab in history
felix losing his mind over a lotto ball roller thing is so funny lmao
Never screw until you get money back. Words to live by. Thank you pewds.

何を話しているのかまったく分からないけど、PewDiePie先輩が楽しそうで嬉しいです。
1番最初に開けた踏切のクオリティが高すぎて驚きました。
This new style of editing and music has a very nice vibe to them. These videos make you feel as if you're there with them now, and those cinematic shots are a big plus!
Felix showing Marzia like a kid showing their mum all their toys
I like that Felix is taking us with him through life. Not feeling pressured to play video games just being his happy self
Grown man opens up silly trinkets for almost 40 minutes. Love it

Marzia: listening in other room
Pewdiepie: I COULD HAVE GOT BREAD!
Love seeing pewd's genuine laugh while unboxing the gachas
Pewds be like "I'm starting to think that spending money on gacha is not really worth it" and one second later he wins something good and takes back his words, PRETTY much sums up how gacha is
I like how as the video goes on he understands how it's intended to be open by breaking it apart with the prize popping out.
27:10 I love how he's just hating on these trucks and as soon as it lights up he loves it.

The one at 11:00 is called a Haniwa, and it's a style of statuette made around the 3rd century AD in Japan by a people and culture much different from that of modern day Japan. I think it's cool how some elements of ancient culture get brought back to life like that.
This could be a decent series every few months if he just grabbed like 10 or so of the ones he wants to collect the most (anime related ones, and memey ones probably) and see how he does
gatchas are great if you have something specific that you like. There is a line of realistic freshwater/deep sea creatures keychains and they're amazing

I can't believe Felix collaborated with PewDiePie again. As a huge fan of both, this is such a dream come true for me, and I'm sure for all of us. This is literally the most perfect duo anyone could ever ask for.
20:16 The laugh every dog/cat owner knows is the laugh of someone who has found something their pet will hate, but they will wear it anyway.
Collaboration of Felix and The Pewdiepie is on another Level ️

12:00 
Kumadori (隈取、くまどり) is the stage makeup worn by kabuki actors.

As a Pug owner, my heart is glad whenever we see Maya and Edgar

seeing pewds smile is precious to me. The man I grew up with and helped me through my tough times.
Love the calm mature nature of pewds. Other hyped youtubers would have spilled all the balls on table to make it look insane
I love watching Felix slowly descend into madness of his own volition
Pewdiepie can make any simple activity into an entertaining video no matter what it's great!

I love this video! Perfect mix of Pewds being silly but also just doing his thing. Also, as a person who loves teeny tiny things, I want so many of those cute gatchas. That panda doing her mascara is cute as a button.

It would have been super cute to see Marzia come in and pick her faves and then you compare yours to hers. I love how you guys have different tastes but still appreciate and value what each others likes. Super cool haha.
Enjoyed Felix's roller coaster ride of emotions. From "I hate this" to "whoaaaaa" real quik.

Pewds: I don’t want to own and get attached to too many things. 

Also pewds: I AM GOING TO BUY EVERY SINGLE ONE OF THESE TOYS!
it's nice to know felix still embraces minimalism
Honestly feeling like a kid again with being so excited to see what the gatcha was going to be, was such a nice feeling. Thank you for the fun video Felix.

Pewdiepie in a sense is a definition of successful life. Didn’t watch you in along time, but gotta say after revisiting your books reviews, I really appreciate the more “intellectual” aspect of your channel. This is not to sound pretentious, this just means I appreciate the culture of literature and thinking.
Would love to see some more book thoughts or list of some more memorable books you’ve read.

“I did also really like the safety box just because of how completely redundant and useless it is, but it still has a function… kinda like me” 
I felt that.
Do these more please. I love watching people open these. Make a series of it. You can maybe donate a box of the ones you don't want or raffle it off for charity.
This is the most I've seen Felix scream in a video in forever. Kinda nostalgic

31:20 This is a famous toy made by Takara Tomy called "Kurohige Kiki Ippatsu, (The Blackbeard in a Crisis).  Blackbeard is a character based on the existent British pirate Edward Teach, and he also appears as one of the characters in One Piece.
Felix sharing the limelight with another small creator is so wholesome
I can say it again and again: I love these pewdiepie collabs Felix does. Helping to get small creators out there
You two should go to Japanese thrift shops and choose clothing items for each other.
It makes me really happy to know how loved Maya was, so cute

the little notebook is called a Goshuin! You use it to collect stamps from temples you visit :D It's pretty cool since a lot of shrines will handwrite something on top of your stamp and some places will have a different stamp depending on the season
Pewds slowly losing his sanity and will to live with each gacha is hilarious

I wish I could find more Gachapon videos like this. Felix literally just randomly bought the Gachas. Whereas other channels buy anime or kawaii gachas. 

I like Felix's because, to me, it gives us a peak into the culture of Japan like with the towelettes or just common items you get as toys. It's much more fun and entertaining.
omg I haven't watched pewds for several years and im so happy that maya and edgar are still alive. what are legends

I LOVE this video because if feels like the perfect blend of classic pewdiepie shenanigans with Felix & Marzia’s Japanese vlog style flair. Great collab
My favorite collabs are the ones with Maya. She always has the best accessories and she’s just the cutest.
I love how even before him doong the losing his mind bit, you can see how his sanity and patience getting little thinner by the minutes, culminating in the lottery bit.

34:30 A goshuincho is a booklet for collecting goshuin.  A goshuin is a letter written by a monk or Shinto priest as proof that a visitor has visited a shrine or temple. Please be aware that there are rules when you actually ask a monk or Shinto priest to write a Shuin.
